General.Name: Guangzhou KingTeller Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Kingteller Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of financial self-service equipment and software in China and internationally. It provides autonomous devices; software products, including terminal application, monitoring and management, system security, comprehensive application, system support class, and mobile application; consultation services, as well as cooperative operation services. Guangzhou Kingteller Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

5.Name: Mr. Taisong  Pang
5.Title: Vice Chairman and Deputy Gen. Mang.
